feature1.explanation: Paragraph 1 and Paragraph 2 both exhibit consistent use of punctuation marks such as commas and periods.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, text and discourse features, and absence of spelling errors, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderately high.
